title: Matt Walsh Bravely Defends His Chickens Against Coyote Attacks
description:
Stephen’s longtime friend Matt Walsh returned to The Late Show last week to chat about his new film, “Unplugged,” and to catch us up on the perils of keeping chickens alive in his California backyard before busting out a bottle of Eva’s signature tequila to do some shots with our host. “Unplugged” is in theaters now!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS
